definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

pinyin: zhi2 xian4 xing4 jia1 su4 qi4

sentences.english: Advanced Aeronautics booster color changes for Apollo and Carrier Drones.
sentences.chinese: 先进航空学将会改变阿波罗和舰载机的加速器颜色。

sentences.english: The USSR was so proud of the synchrophasotron.
sentences.chinese: 苏联是如此为这个加速器而自豪。

sentences.english: He beat time on the accelerator .
sentences.chinese: 他用脚在加速器上打拍子。

sentences.english: In addition, the design of labyrinth and the two protection doors in cyclotron rooms were conservative.
sentences.chinese: 回旋加速器室两道防护门和迷道长度的设计是保守的。

sentences.english: This article discusses the characteristics of cyclotron prototyping model.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了回旋加速器虚拟样机模型的特点。

sentences.english: A simple method for the estimation of the transverse shielding for intense- beam proton linac was described briefly.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了估算强流质子直线加速器横向屏蔽的方法。

sentences.english: Therefore it is necessary to design an intense beam accelerator in line with the equipartitioning principle.
sentences.chinese: 因此，有必要按照‘均温’的原则设计强流加速器。

sentences.english: The developments of cyclotrons are outlined.
sentences.chinese: 五十年来，回旋加速器有了很大发展。

sentences.english: Now the synchrophasotron is almost unmounted.
sentences.chinese: 现在这个加速器几乎是废弃了。

sentences.english: In the description of linacs we have swept many problems.
sentences.chinese: 在对直线加速器的描述中，我们已经回避了许多问题。

sentences.english: A small recording accelerometer in the model furnishes data on its behavior .
sentences.chinese: 模型中装有小型加速器用以记录其运动状态的数据。

sentences.english: To downshift without using your brakes, simply let off the gas and wait until your speed decreases.
sentences.chinese: 减挡不用刹车，只是抬起加速器踏板，等待速度下降。

sentences.english: We introduce principles and characteristics of different bunch length monitors for electron Linac in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 对电子直线加速器束团长度监测器进行了综述。

sentences.english: The three-wave interaction in a laser beat-wave accelerator are studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了激光拍频波加速器中的三波相互作用过程。

sentences.english: Study on the section-division of superconducting proton linac is carried out in detail.
sentences.chinese: 对超导直线加速器的分段进行了详细的研究。

sentences.english: The device also contains an accelerometer and a gyro sensor for full motion controls.
sentences.chinese: 并且加入了加速器和陀螺达到运动控制效果。
